select sa.activity_type,ae.score,ae.evaluation_content from activity_score ae join shanduo_activity sa on sa.id = ae.activity_id where ae.activity_id in (select id from shanduo_activity where user_id = #{0} and del_flag = '0') and ae.score is not null and sa.del_flag = '0' and ae.del_flag = '0' order by sa.activity_start_time desc,ae.create_date desc limit #{1},#{2}

select sa.activity_name,ar.`mode`, su.user_name,su.id as uid,su.head_portrait_id,su.gender,su.birthday,sa.id,ye.score,ye.user_id, sa.user_id,ye.evaluation_content,ye.be_evaluated,ye.others_score from activity_score ye join shanduo_activity sa on ye.activity_id = sa.id join shanduo_user su on ye.user_id = su.id or sa.user_id = su.id join activity_requirement ar on sa.id = ar.activity_id where sa.del_flag = '0' and su.del_flag = '0' and ye.del_flag = '0' and ar.del_flag = '0' and (ye.score is not null or ye.others_score is not null) and sa.user_id = #{0} group by su.id,sa.id order by sa.update_date desc limit #{1},#{2}

select count(sa.id) from shanduo_activity sa join activity_score ye on ye.activity_id = sa.id where sa.del_flag = '0' and ye.del_flag = '0' and sa.user_id = #{0} and (ye.score is not null or ye.others_score is not null)

select sa.activity_name,ar.`mode`, su.user_name,su.id as uid,su.head_portrait_id,su.gender,su.birthday,sa.id from shanduo_activity sa join activity_score ye on sa.id = ye.activity_id join activity_requirement ar on sa.id = ar.activity_id join shanduo_user su on sa.user_id = su.id where ye.user_id = #{0} and sa.del_flag = '0' and ye.del_flag = '0' and ar.del_flag = '0' and su.del_flag = '0' and(ye.score is not null or ye.others_score is not null) group by su.id,sa.id order by sa.update_date desc limit #{1},#{2}
